'''Serra FreyÂ '''is one of the many granddaughters of [[Walder Frey]]. She only appears in the [[Season 3]] episode "[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Serra is one of the many granddaughters of [[Walder Frey]], the [[Lord of the Crossing]].
===[[Season 3]]===
Along with several of Lord Frey's other daughters and granddaughters, [[Robb Stark]] had the option of marrying her. When he arrives at [[The Twins]] for his uncle [[Edmure Tully|Edmure]]'sÂ [[Red Wedding|wedding]], Robb apologizesÂ for his slight against them. Lord Walder states that Robb could have had either Serra or her twin sister [[Sarra Frey|Sarra]], or he could have had both for all Walder cared.<ref>"[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]"</ref>
